original_text: In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
korean_text: 길 가운데로 흐르더라 강 좌우에 생명나무가 있어 열두 가지 열매를 맺되 달마다 그 열매를 맺고 그 나무 잎사귀들은 만국을 치료하기 위하여 있더라

sentences.original_text: In the midst of the street of it
and on either side of the river
was there the tree of life
which bare twelve manner of fruits
and yielded her fruit every month
and the leaves of the tree
were for the healing of the nations
